lines: 1. 'S'emambia yokobokigwa,getureri nkebuge,Ntoboke (Halleluya) Ntoboke.'Bachenu mbachenge gocha,'mariga takobao, Ntoboke(Halleluya! 'mambi eyio Natoboke)Ntoboke.
2. 'Semambia yokibokigwa naki'Mogand'orabe!Ntoboke (Halleluya) Ntoboke.Tata, Baba, Banchwa bonsi,kero torarorane, Ntoboke(Halleluya 'mambi'eyio Natoboke)Ntoboke.
3. 'Semambia yokobokigwa'Birengereri'ebiya,Ntoboke (Halleluya) Ntoboke.Morore Motori 'omwanchwa,Bwerwete agankwera, Ntoboke(Halleluya' manbieyio Natoboke)Ntoboke
4. 'Semambia yokobokigwa,Ntoumeran' amare,Ntoboke (Halleluya) Natoboke.Ntoirwe as'obonene's'enk'engiy'ekomesa, Ntoboke(Halleluya! Mambi'eyio Natoboke)Ntoboke.
